reviews.review: Fun game if you play with friends
This game is like CBT, I hate it. 10/10 would put in another 1000 hours.

LOL, this game is pretty good,but there're problems with community. In this game the most important thing is teamplay, but there're many types of individuals, who at the first opportunity will run away!Do not play as bad as they play, just try to help  your teammates!

Edit 2:I have been playing this game for a while now but not on PC. Up until recently my PC was not good enough to play this game. But I did have a switch which i played on a lot and it was fun because even though I understood that I was playing the worst version of this game it was OK because I knew everyone else was in the same boat so it didn't feel to bad. Up until cross play was launched after getting destroyed by player on better hardware for about a month and no one playing on the switch with cross play turned off. I gave up this is after 1000 hours and 200$ in micro-transactions and owning all of the dlc in the eshop as well. I still remember how happy I was when I could finally get Freddy and leather face. Getting to play as Freddy was one of the main reasons I wanted to play the game and i was so disappointed when he wasn't available to switch players. Then I saw a ray of hope cross progression and they specifically said switch was going to be one of the consoles to support it. With a new computer and already owning the game on steam I could keep my lvls the costume's i had earned from the archives and the ones I bought and they said verbatim it would be here Sep 2020. IT IS NOVEMBER 30th 2021 at the time of this edit and cross progression for switch is nowhere to be found.Cross play has killed the switch version of this game if you do play on it your stuck playing against pc, xbox one /x and ps4/5 players who are playing on hardware that is light years ahead of the switch and its laggy, unresponsive and downright ugly port. I refuse to start over when its the devs fault that my version of the game got shafted. And they have not mentioned it since. I have no idea if this is still on the table or even possible if they at least acknowledged that they can't and gave me a reason I would not be as upset as i am. But at this point the devs have destroyed all faith i had in them and this game. I cannot recommend a game that has devs making empty promises about there game and then sweep it under the rug and acting like they never said anything. And even if they do someday release this feature I don't think Ill ever play this game again. I'm just disappointed because this is one of my favorite games and because they've waited so long to put out a feature that they promised would be released and even gave a time frame. That i no long want to play it I've moved on and i don't know if ill ever be back.

Edit:the game runs better now it still has a lot of problems but its worth a try if you like the concept of the game.


Bought this game day 1, 5 hours later i uninstalled it because it ran poorly and kept crashing almost 2 years later i watched some people playing it on YouTube and see the new killers I wanted to buy them and try them but i remembered my first time with it so i download it to see what 2 years of updates had done to the game i pick my survivor load into the lobby everyone says there ready the loading screen shows up and it never loads i wait about 10 minutes to see if it would load nothing so one ctrl alt del later i uninstall it again guess i'll wait another 2 years and see if i can play a game yet.
Need to be more stable but otherwise the best murder your friends and strangers game around

The game itself is very nice. Easy to learn, hard to master. You gotta learn all the perks and stuff. But here comes the community of this game (It`s a total cancer). If you want to play killer without Hex:Ruin then nope. You`re gonna kill 1 person at most. The rank reset is a bullshit too, how a new player can play against some 2k hours killer? It`s pretty decent but still needs a lot of changes and fixes. But still I love it.
